org.wso2.carbon.registry.core.jdbc.handlers.builtin
Class MountHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.wso2.carbon.repository.handlers.Handler
      org.wso2.carbon.registry.core.jdbc.handlers.builtin.MountHandler

public class MountHandler
extends org.wso2.carbon.repository.handlers.Handler

This class is used to handle registry calls to mounted registry instances. This plays a key role in making it possible to do remote mounting via configuration (registry.xml) as well as the user interface in a transparent manner.
